primary_phone.department: Salt Lake City Parking & Civil Citations
primary_phone.purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.

sections.authority_name: Salt Lake City Hearings and Collections (Parking & Civil Citations)

serves.description: Parking and civil citations issued by Salt Lake City within city limits.

how_to_recognize.notes: City citations generally have numeric citation numbers; the ticket will list Salt Lake City as the issuing authority.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be filed online or by scheduling an in-person hearing; mail appeals are not accepted.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Salt Lake City requires appeals to be filed online or in person; no mailing address for appeals is provided【6209850904271†L160-L176】【6209850904271†L195-L199】.

confirm_by_phone.department: Salt Lake City Parking & Civil Citations Office
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the correct procedure for contesting a parking or civil citation and verify that no mail address is required.

verification.verified_source_note: Salt Lake City website indicates appeals must be filed online or in person; no mailing address given【6209850904271†L160-L176】【6209850904271†L195-L199】.

sections.canonical_section_name: Greater Salt Lake Municipal Services District
sections.authority_name: Greater Salt Lake Municipal Services District

serves.description: Parking citations issued in unincorporated areas of Salt Lake County and participating municipalities served by the Greater Salt Lake Municipal Services District.

how_to_recognize.notes: Parking notices may be labeled as 'Greater Salt Lake MSD' and include a notice number.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be filed by mail or delivered in person within 20 calendar days to the Administrative Law Judge.

appeal_mail_to.department: Greater Salt Lake Municipal Services District

confirm_by_phone.department: Greater Salt Lake Municipal Services District
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the administrative appeal mailing address and process.

verification.verified_source_note: Parking ticket portal states appeals must be filed in writing and mailed or delivered to 860 Levoy Dr., Suite 300, Taylorsville, UT【919734330196339†L93-L114】, and provides main phone and mailing address【919734330196339†L238-L244】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on University of Utah campus managed by Commuter Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: Citations issued on campus list 'University of Utah Commuter Services' and include a citation number.

submission_methods.notes: Parking citations must be appealed online within 20 calendar days; the appeals committee requires a second-level appeal but first-level appeals are online only.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: University of Utah requires citation appeals to be filed online; no mailing address is provided for initial appeals【224983424642490†L17-L23】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the online appeal process and verify there is no mailing address for first-level parking citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: Commuter Services materials indicate appeals must be started online and provide a second-level appeals committee form that can be mailed to 311 Fort Douglas Blvd, but no mailing address for initial appeals【224983424642490†L17-L23】.

sections.canonical_section_name: Salt Lake Community College Parking Services
sections.authority_name: Salt Lake Community College Parking Services

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Salt Lake Community College campuses.

how_to_recognize.notes: Citations are issued by SLCC Parking Services and include a citation number.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be submitted through the online Parking Services portal within 25 days; a written appeal by mail is not accepted【804126158403708†L151-L160】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Salt Lake Community College instructs appellants to use the online Parking Services portal for appeals and does not provide a mailing address【804126158403708†L151-L160】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the online appeal process for parking citations and verify there is no mailing address.

verification.verified_source_note: SLCC parking citations page instructs appellants to submit appeals through the online portal and does not provide a mailing address【804126158403708†L151-L160】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Westminster University campus by Parking Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: Westminster parking citations typically have numeric identifiers and reference the university's parking services.

submission_methods.notes: Parking ticket appeals are submitted using an online form; there is no mailing address provided.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Westminster University requires parking ticket appeals to be submitted via an online form; no mailing address is provided.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the parking ticket appeal process and verify that no mailing address is available.

verification.verified_source_note: Westminster University campus directory lists contact phone and email for Parking Services and refers to an online parking ticket appeal form, but no mailing address is provided【228963728750757†L690-L694】.

sections.canonical_section_name: Salt Lake City International Airport Police
sections.authority_name: Salt Lake City Department of Airports / Airport Police Bureau

serves.description: Parking citations issued at Salt Lake City International Airport property by airport police or traffic enforcement officers.

how_to_recognize.notes: Citations are issued by airport police; numbers may include letters and digits; instructions on the back of the citation explain how to contest it.

submission_methods.notes: To contest a parking citation, follow the instructions on the back of the ticket and speak to a hearing officer; no mailing address is provided【40650875264649†L92-L97】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Airport police instruct that parking citations must be contested by speaking to a hearing officer; no mailing address for appeals provided【40650875264649†L92-L97】.

confirm_by_phone.department: Salt Lake City Airport Police Department
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the procedure for contesting airport parking citations and verify that there is no mailing address.

verification.verified_source_note: Airport police FAQ states that parking citations have instructions on the back explaining the procedure for speaking to a hearing officer, with no mailing address provided【40650875264649†L92-L97】.

blocking_issues: Several sections (Salt Lake City, University of Utah, SLCC, Westminster University, SLC Airport) lack confirmed mailing addresses for Phase‑1 appeals and require confirmation that online or in‑person procedures are the only options.
known_gaps: Citation number patterns for each authority are assumed with low confidence due to lack of explicit information.
University of Utah and Westminster University sections rely on online-only appeal processes; mailing addresses for first-level appeals are not provided and must be confirmed by phone.
